The sketch should have a single face (face\\_1). face\\_1 should have one loop (loop\\_1), comprised of four lines: 1. line\\_1 - Starting from [0.0, 0.0] and ending at [0.5, 0.0] 2. line\\_2 - Starting from [0.5, 0.0] and ending at [0.5, 0.5] 3. line\\_3 - Starting from [0.5, 0.5] and ending at [0.0, 0.5] 4. line\\_4 - Starting from [0.0, 0.5] and ending at [0.0, 0.0] The dimensions of the prism are approximately 0.5 (length) x 0.5 (width) x 0.5 (height) units, with the center at [0.0, 0.25, 0.25]. Now, perform a scale operation on the sketch with a scale factor of 0.5. Extrude the scaled sketch along the normal by 0.5 units, creating a 0.5 x 0.5 x 0.5 prism with a flat top and bottom. Part 2: Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top, bottom, and one sloped side. Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation vector: [0.0, 0.25, 0.0] Now, create a sketch for the XY plane of the new coordinate system. The sketch should have one face (face\\_1). On face\\_1, draw one loop (loop\\_1), which should be made up of four lines: 1. line\\_1 - Starting at [0.0, 0.0] and ending at [0.25, 0.0] 2. line\\_2 - Starting at [0.25, 0.0] and ending at [0.25, 0.25] 3. line\\_3 - Starting at [0.25, 0.25] and ending at [0.0, 0.25] 4. line\\_4 - Starting at [0.0, 0.25] and ending at [0.0, 0.0] Now, perform a scale operation on the sketch with a scale factor of 0.25. Extrude the scaled sketch along the normal by 0.25 units, adding the sloped face to the previously constructed prism. The final shape is approximately 2 (length) x 1 (width) x 0.5 (height) units with the narrowest point at the top and a slightly tapered shape. The shape is centered on a white background.</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.75,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.5,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.5,0.0],"End Point":[0.5,0.5]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.5,0.5],"End Point":[0.0,0.5]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.5],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.5,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.5,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}},"part_2":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.25,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.25,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.25,0.0],"End Point":[0.25,0.25]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.25,0.25],"End Point":[0.0,0.25]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.25],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.25,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.25,"operation":"JoinFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>

prompt: <description>Part 1: Three-Dimensional Rectangular Prism with a Flat Top and Bottom The first part is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The front face is angled at 45 degrees. 1. Create a new coordinate system with the following parameters: - Euler Angles: (0.0, 0.0, -90.0) - Translation Vector: (0.0, 0.2499, 0.0) 2. Construct the 2D sketch on the XY plane of the new coordinate system with the following steps: a. Draw the first line from (0.0, 0.0) to (0.75, 0.0). b. Draw the second line from (0.75, 0.0) to (0.75, 0.238). c. Draw the third line from (0.75, 0.238) to (0.2898, 0.238). d. Draw the fourth line from (0.2898, 0.238) to (0.2898, 0.58). e. Draw the fifth line from (0.2898, 0.58) to (0.0, 0.58). f. Close the loop by connecting the end of the fifth line to the start of the first line at (0.0, 0.0). 3. Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. 4. Transform the scaled 2D sketch to a 3D sketch using the new coordinate system, with a rotation of 0.0, 0.0, and -90.0 degrees (around Z, Y, and X axes, respectively) and a translation vector of (0.0, 0.2499, 0.0). 5. Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal vector by a distance of 0.2499 to create the 3D model. After completing these steps, the final shape of part 1 should have the following dimensions: - Length: 0.75 - Width: 0.2499 - Height: 0.75</description>

</json>
